hanzi-su-wiki:
預

Значения

Отдавать на хранение, оставлять на время; принимать на хранение; заранее

Мнемоника

Оставлять товар на хранение до заключения сделки 予, хорошо продумывать её головой 頁.

Варианты

预
purpleculture_pinyin:
yù
to advance; in advance; beforehand; to prepare
для продвижения; заранее; заранее; подготовить
rtega_mnemonic:
預預RS
预预		prepare, arrange, in advance, deposit, take care
  • what is before 予 in the head 頁: preparation; one deposits it to be taken care of
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 预)
Pictophonetic: 予 indicates the sound; 頁 (page) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
預防 [ yù fáng ]: to prevent; to take precautions against; to protect; to guard against; precautionary; prophylactic
預報 [ yù bào ]: forecast
預算 [ yù suàn ]: budget
預計 [ yù jì ]: to forecast; to predict; to estimate
預測 [ yù cè ]: to forecast; to predict

heisig_chinese_memo: Check everything on the page beforehand so you know what you're getting yourself into. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: deposit, beforehand, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
Keyword_KANJIDIC: deposit, custody, leave with, entrust to
koohiiStory1: Depositing money into your savings account is something you do beforehand if you use your head. If you´re in Japan your passbook says 預金機（よきんき）when you make a deposit.
koohiiStory2: You bang your head on the ATM, wishing you´d deposited some money beforehand.
jp_example_words:
預金(よきん): deposit, bank account
預かる(あずかる): take charge of, receive deposit
預ける(あずける): put in charge of, to deposit
jp_readingExamples: 預かる (あず.かる), 預ける (あず.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you want to buy a geoduck you have to go to the bank beforehand to deposit enough money. If you don't deposit your money you won't have enough in your account to buy even one! They're expensive, after all.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself depositing your money beforehand. Imagine the delicious geoduck you'll be able to buy now that the money has been deposited into your account!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You go to the bank to make the deposit and there is a kid standing in your way playing with a yo-yo (よ). You try to squeeze past and he hits you in the face with the yo-yo! Now you can't see! Now you can't make the deposit!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine trying to make a deposit to your bank after getting hit in the face with a yo-yo. You can hardly see what you're shoving your money into. You hope it isn't the hands of the kid that hit you!
Ru_Meaning: deposit, custody, leave with, entrust to
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 亅 (зазубрина), ハ, マ, 欠 (недостача), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Ru_trainchinese: yù: (графема) заранее, заблаговременно; принимать участие в
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the page (頁) was previously (予) deposited
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Learning to throw ceremonial spears is dangerous.  Beforehand you have to make sure you have the right safety equipment and keep your head up at all times.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " page ", the sound of " Yes " indicates that there is preparation in advance. "Warring States Policy-Yan Policy III": "So the prince envisioned the dagger of the world."

" Pre " also means participation. Han Lujia "Xinyu‧ Qualifications": "Sages or those who hide in the fields and do not anticipate the affairs of the country are ministers who watch and listen, and are not clear below."

" Pre " also means intervention and trouble. Han Xunyue's "Han Ji-Cheng Di Ji Yi": "The relatives of the harem should not pre-policy affairs, and the power of the women's party will be damaged by such things as Huangfu."

" Pre " also means involvement and involvement. The Southern Dynasties Liang Liu Xie's "Wen Xin Diao Long‧ Finger Flaws": "How to care for training and grasping, how to be reasonable."

" Pre " also refers to peace and happiness. "Shuowen New Attachment": "An Ye. Case: Classic General Yu. From the page. Unknown." Tang Bai Juyi, "Hewei's Poems‧ and Forty Rhymes on March 30th": "Xianting Day Deng Gao, Tiger Qiu Shiyou previewed."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " page ", the sound of " Yes " indicates that there is preparation in advance.
humanum_full_description:
從「頁」，「予」聲，表示事先有准備。《戰國策‧燕策三》：「於是太子預求天下之利匕首。」

　　「預」也表示參與。漢陸賈《新語‧資質》：「賢聖或隱於田里而不預國家之事者，乃觀聽之臣，不明於下。」

　　「預」還表示干預、過問。漢荀悅《漢紀‧成帝紀一》：「後宮親屬勿預政事，以遠皇甫之類，損女黨之權。」

　　「預」也表示關涉、牽連。南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧指瑕》：「撫訓執握，何預情理。」

　　「預」也指安樂。《說文新附》：「安也。案：經典通用豫。从頁。未詳。」 唐白居易《和微之詩‧和三月三十日四十韻》：「仙亭日登眺，虎丘時遊預。」
humanum_short_description: 從「頁」，「予」聲，表示事先有准備。

從「 頁 」，「 予 」聲，表示事先有准備。《戰國策‧燕策三》：「於是太子預求天下之利匕首。」 「 預 」也表示參與。漢陸賈《新語‧資質》：「賢聖或隱於田里而不預國家之事者，乃觀聽之臣，不明於下。」 「 預 」還表示干預、過問。漢荀悅《漢紀‧成帝紀一》：「後宮親屬勿預政事，以遠皇甫之類，損女黨之權。」 「 預 」也表示關涉、牽連。南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧指瑕》：「撫訓執握，何預情理。」 「 預 」也指安樂。《說文新附》：「安也。案：經典通用豫。从頁。未詳。」 唐白居易《和微之詩‧和三月三十日四十韻》：「仙亭日登眺，虎丘時遊預。」
From the " page", the sound of " Yes" indicates that there is preparation in advance. "Warring States Policy-Yan Policy III": "So the prince envisioned the dagger of the world." " Pre" also means participation. Han Lujia "Xinyu‧ Qualifications": "Sages or those who hide in the fields and do not anticipate the affairs of the country are ministers who watch and listen, and are not clear below." " Pre" also means intervention and trouble. Han Xunyue's "Han Ji-Cheng Di Ji Yi": "The relatives of the harem should not pre-policy affairs, and the power of the women's party will be damaged by such things as Huangfu." " Pre" also means involvement and involvement. The Southern Dynasties Liang Liu Xie's "Wen Xin Diao Long‧ Finger Flaws": "How to care for training and grasping, how to be reasonable." " Pre" also refers to peace and happiness. "Shuowen New Attachment": "An Ye. Case: Classic General Yu. From the page. Unknown." Tang Bai Juyi, "Hewei's Poems‧ and Forty Rhymes on March 30th": "Xianting Day Deng Gao, Tiger Qiu Shiyou previewed."

yù

預字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》羊洳切，去御，以。］
“预1”的繁体字。
(1)事先；事先有准备。
(2)参与；参加。
(3)干预，过问。
(4)关涉；牵连。
(5)安乐。

預字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　預； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1401第03
【唐韻】【韻會】羊洳切【集韻】【正韻】羊茹切，?音譽。【正字通】與豫同。【經典】通作豫。　又【正韻】及也，參預也，干也。通作與。

yù
вм. 预
Radicals: 予, 頁  (beforehand, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you want to buy a geoduck you have to go to the bank beforehand to deposit enough money. If you don't deposit your money you won't have enough in your account to buy even one! They're expensive, after all.
Imagine yourself depositing your money beforehand. Imagine the delicious geoduck you'll be able to buy now that the money has been deposited into your account!
Reading Mnemonic
You go to the bank to make the deposit and there is a kid standing in your way playing with a yo-yo (よ). You try to squeeze past and he hits you in the face with the yo-yo! Now you can't see! Now you can't make the deposit!
Imagine trying to make a deposit to your bank after getting hit in the face with a yo-yo. You can hardly see what you're shoving your money into. You hope it isn't the hands of the kid that hit you!
